查询所有生产订单信息: 查找物料采购订单和检验报告的关联
SELECT * FROM kn_quality_trace_prod_orde: SELECT A.material_number, A.ebeln, B.report_no, B.result, B.sup_result FROM kn_quality_trace_bom_data A LEFT JOIN kn_quality_trace_bom_data_supplier B ON A.ebeln = B.order_no AND A.material_number = B.material_code;

查询所有生产订单信息: 查看生产订单按状态的工期统计

SELECT * FROM kn_quality_trace_prod_orde: SELECT A.locationnumber_s, A.wcname_s, A.mainrescode_s, B.reason, B.exception_time FROM kn_quality_trace_prod_order A LEFT JOIN kn_quality_equipment_exception_data B ON A.deviceid_s = B.device_id;

查询所有生产订单信息: 查看BOM数据的批次追溯信息
SELECT * FROM kn_quality_trace_prod_orde: SELECT A.material_number, A.batch, B.railwayno, B.zs_figureno_s FROM kn_quality_trace_bom_data A LEFT JOIN kn_quality_trace_bom_data_fault B ON A.order_number = B.workorderno_s AND A.material_number = B.partno_s;

查询所有生产订单信息: 查找生产订单中的返工情况
SELECT * FROM kn_quality_trace_prod_orde: SELECT A.workorderno_s, A.orderstate_s, B.testcount_s, B.testsortupcheck_s FROM kn_quality_trace_prod_order A LEFT JOIN kn_quality_trace_prod_order_self B ON A.orderno_s = B.workordernumber_s WHERE B.testcount_s > 1;

SELECT * FROM kn_quality_trace_prod_orde: SELECT A.workorderno_s, A.planstarttime_t, A.actualstarttime_t, B.starttime, B.endtime FROM kn_quality_trace_prod_order A LEFT JOIN kn_quality_trace_prod_order_process B ON A.workorderno_s = B.orderno;

查询所有生产订单信息: 查询BOM数据中的虚拟件情况

查询所有生产订单信息: 查找生产订单的报工完成率
SELECT * FROM kn_quality_trace_prod_orde: SELECT prolinename_s, (COUNT(CASE WHEN isjobworking_s = '已报工' THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*)) * 100 as completion_rate FROM kn_quality_trace_prod_order GROUP BY prolinename_s;

查询所有生产订单信息: 查看供应商检验报告的复核差异
SELECT * FROM kn_quality_trace_prod_orde: SELECT material_code, item_name, measure_value, review_value, ABS(CAST(measure_value AS DECIMAL) - CAST(review_value AS DECIMAL)) as difference FROM kn_quality_trace_bom_data_supplier WHERE measure_value IS NOT NULL AND review_value IS NOT NULL;

查询所有生产订单信息: 查找物料的图纸版本一致性检查

SELECT * FROM kn_quality_trace_prod_orde: SELECT A.mainrescode_s, COUNT(A.workorderno_s) as usage_count, COUNT(B.device_id) as exception_count FROM kn_quality_trace_prod_order A LEFT JOIN kn_quality_equipment_exception_data B ON A.deviceid_s = B.device_id GROUP BY A.mainrescode_s;

查询所有生产订单信息: 查询按项目统计的质检通过率
SELECT * FROM kn_quality_trace_prod_orde: SELECT A.projectname_s, COUNT(B.testsortupcheck_s) as total_checks, SUM(CASE WHEN B.testsortupcheck_s = '合格' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as passed_checks FROM kn_quality_trace_prod_order A LEFT JOIN kn_quality_trace_prod_order_self B ON A.orderno_s = B.workordernumber_s GROUP BY A.projectname_s;

查询所有生产订单信息: 查找供应商检验中的让步接收情况
SELECT * FROM kn_quality_trace_prod_orde: SELECT sup_company_name, material_name, sup_result, concess_no FROM kn_quality_trace_bom_data_supplier WHERE sup_result = '3' AND concess_no IS NOT NULL;

查询所有生产订单信息: 查看生产订单的工序质检完整性
SELECT * FROM kn_quality_trace_prod_orde: SELECT A.workorderno_s, COUNT(DISTINCT A.routeoperanumber_s) as total_operations, COUNT(DISTINCT B.routeoperanumber_s) as checked_operations FROM kn_quality_trace_prod_order A LEFT JOIN kn_quality_trace_prod_order_self B ON A.orderno_s = B.workordernumber_s GROUP BY A.workorderno_s;

查询所有生产订单信息: 查询物料检验的及时性分析
SELECT * FROM kn_quality_trace_prod_orde: SELECT material_description, DATEDIFF(inspection_end_date, inspection_start_date) as inspection_days FROM kn_quality_trace_bom_data WHERE inspection_start_date IS NOT NULL AND inspection_end_date IS NOT NULL;

查询所有生产订单信息: 查看设备异常的时间分布模式
SELECT * FROM kn_quality_trace_prod_orde: SELECT HOUR(exception_time) as hour, COUNT(*) as exception_count FROM kn_quality_equipment_exception_data GROUP BY HOUR(exception_time) ORDER BY hour;

查询所有生产订单信息: 查询BOM数据的批次质量追溯
SELECT * FROM kn_quality_trace_prod_orde: SELECT A.batch, A.material_description, A.supplier_name, B.projectname_s, B.railwayno FROM kn_quality_trace_bom_data A LEFT JOIN kn_quality_trace_bom_data_fault B ON A.order_number = B.workorderno_s WHERE A.defect_quantity > 0;

查询所有生产订单信息: 查询主要的故障模式
SELECT * FROM kn_quality_trace_prod_orde: SELECT defect_name, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM kn_quality_trace_history_fault_corrective WHERE del_flag = '0' GROUP BY defect_name ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT 10;

查询所有生产订单信息: 查询玻璃钢罩板表面缺陷的原因是什么
SELECT * FROM kn_quality_trace_prod_orde: SELECT material_name, defect_name, cause_analysis FROM kn_quality_trace_history_fault_corrective WHERE material_name LIKE '%玻璃钢罩板%' AND defect_name LIKE '%表面缺陷%' LIMIT 1;
